items.question: How old are you when you get pregnant?
Do you think teenage pregnancy is risky?
Are you aware of the various of contraceptive methods (protection) that are available?
Why did you become pregnant as a teenager
choices: I was expecting my partner to use contraception
I thought I couldn't get pregnant
Got caught up in the moment

items.question: If you decided to continue the pregnancy what were your reason?
choices: I didn't really think about options
I felt pressured not to have abortion
It wasn't planned but realized I wanted it

items.question: Do you think relying on the morning after pill is enough to prevent pregnancy?
In your opinion what is the main reason why teen get pregnant?
Schools and parent are doing enough to educate teenagers about the dangers of teen pregnancy?
What would you suggest should be done to reduce the rates of unplanned teenage pregnancy (contraception)?
choices: Better access to availability of contraception
Better sex and relationship education in schools
Improving aspirations of young people generally
